_header: Behold marvels a maid is mother
Subjects: Christ, attributes of; Virgin Mary, attributes of
_description: Attributes of the Virgin and Christ — two couplets

BodLauMis108.Transcription:
Behalde merueylis a mayde ys moderIsaye viioLyfe
                        fouȝte with deþ and deþ is slayneOsee
                        xiijoHere sone her fader ys & broderysaye
                        ixoLyfe fawȝt with deþ & deþ is
                    slayneOsee xiiioMost hiȝ was lowe he styȝe
                    agaynephilipens iio
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope,
                        ed.  
             Secular Lyrics of the XIV and XV Centuries.
         2nd ed. Oxford: Clarendon, 1955: 241.
